BBEX3.A.SVC.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in El Salvador / USD 1 = SVC ... (middle)
General: With effect from 1 January 2001, the US dollar was introduced as legal tender alongside the El Salvador colón at the rate of USD 1 = SVC 8.75.
Source: Since 2001: Banco Central de Reserva de El Salvador, San Salvador.  1991 - 2000: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
Methodology: Until 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end buying and selling rates.
